A

action - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableEvent
It points out whether this event is a Receive [set to RECEIVE] or a Send [set to SEND] event.
add2cachedProviders(String, String, String) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
Is usually called by JxtaReliableMcastService to store the information about the providers that did respond to our Join Request Message.
addRMSEventListener(JxtaReliableEventListener) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
Registers a JxtaReliableEventListener.

B

BUFFSIZE - Static variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The maximum size of the message buffer of the node for the channel.
BUFF_SIZE - Static variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
The byte size of the buffer used to read the datagram packets sent/received by the JxtaMulticastSocket.

C

CHANNEL - Static variable in class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory
The name of the element that represents the ID of the channel through which the message is sent.
CHLD_THRESHOLD - Static variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The following static variable indicates the maximum allowed number of children.
CHLD_TIMEOUT - Static variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The following static variable indicates the length of the intervals for checking if there is an empty place for a new child.
ChannelProvider - class rmp.ChannelProvider.
Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description:
ChannelProvider is a simple class that holds information about the provider of a channel.
ChannelProvider(String, String, String) - Constructor for class rmp.ChannelProvider
Create a ChannelProvider with given provider name, peerID, pipeID
cachedProviders - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
This vector contains the Providers that did respond to the Join Request Message when we firslty joined the channel, and we have to keep them (although only one is used) in the case that the local node unexpectedly disconnects from its parent.
ch - Static variable in class rmp.TestRMS
 
chann_thread - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The running thread for accepting new children bidi connections.
channel - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
This field holds the channel object that our node is connected to [if the code is extended to support the ability of joining to multiple channels then a Data Structure is going to be needed]
channelID - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableEvent
It holds the ID of the channel from which the message was received.
channelID - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The string that identifies the channel.
channel_is_Active - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
A boolean variable that is set to "TRUE" if the channel is alive.
channel_is_ready - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
A boolean variable that is set to "TRUE" if the channel is successfully prepared.
channel_responses_lock - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
This object is used to lock the main thrad so that the thread of the RMS will have the time to receive some responses to the query that we sent for joining.
chld_BiDiPipes - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
This is the vector that holds the bidipipes of all the connections with our children(if the local node is a Provider).
chld_advs - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The vector that holds the information of the attached children.
closeChannel() - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
Is used to inform the atached chldren (if we have any) that we will stop be a provider and then closes the channel (stop sending receiving messages - detached from parent - children).
create() - Method in class rmp.TestRMS

createQueryMessage(String, String, String) - Static method in class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory

createResponseMessage(String, String, String, String) - Static method in class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory

createRetransmissionMessage(String, String, String, int, String, String) - Static method in class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory

create_McastSock(PeerGroup) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
Initializes the field mcastSocket by creating a new JxtaMulticastSocket given a)the PeerGroup that we are joined at and b)the private PipeAdvertisement [all the nodes that run RMS have one].

create_channel(String) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
It is called from outside (external class) to create a new JxtaReliableMcastChannel so that we can transmit through it data (send messages to other listening nodes).

F

forward_message_to_children(Message) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
Forwards a message to all the attached children, through the JxtaBiDiPipes that are bound to them.
full_of_chld_Lock - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
Just a lock that is used in the case that a provider is full of children and cannot accept new bidi connections.

I

id - Variable in class rmp.ChannelProvider
The peer ID of the provider in String representation.
isIsland - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
A boolean variable that is set to "TRUE" if local node has joined to a channel but hasn't received yet a Join response from another provider or even from the root of the channel.
isProvider - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
A boolean variable that is set to "TRUE" if local node is a Provider (in that case the node can accept secure connection requests from future children).
isProvider() - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
Returns "TRUE" if our node is a Provider.
isReady() - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
Returns "TRUE" if the channel is successfully prepared.
isRoot - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
A boolean variable that is set to "TRUE" if local node is the one who created the channel and will be the traffic generator of the multicast channel(message source).
is_first_message - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
This boolean variable is set to "TRUE" if we firstly receive a message after our join to the channel.

J

JxtaReliableEvent - class rmp.JxtaReliableEvent.
Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description:
Container of the JxtaReliableEvent events, generated by the sending - receiving action of the channel Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005 Company: JXTA ORG
JxtaReliableEvent() - Constructor for class rmp.JxtaReliableEvent
 
JxtaReliableEventListener - interface rmp.JxtaReliableEventListener.
Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description:
This interface is used in order to set up a JxtaReliableMcastChannel listener.
JxtaReliableMcastChannel - class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel.
Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description: :
The connections between the nodes of the multicast tree of the channel that are used for exchanging messages, are implemented with JxtaBiDiPipes in both directions.
JxtaReliableMcastChannel(PeerGroup, String) - Constructor for class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
This is the constructor of the JxtaReliableMcastChannel class and it initializes some of the above fields.
JxtaReliableMcastService - class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService.
Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description:
This class is the manager of the channels that a node-peer can create or can join to.
JxtaReliableMcastService(PeerGroup) - Constructor for class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
This is the constructor of the JxtaReliableMcastService class.
join(TestRMS) - Method in class rmp.TestRMS
 
joinChannel(String, JxtaReliableEventListener) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
It is called from outside (external class) to join a pre existing channel and start listening the data (messages) that the root of the channel is sending.

M

MAX_LISTENERS_NUM - Static variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The following static variable indicates the maximum number of allowed attached listeners.
MESSAGETYPE - Static variable in class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory
The name of the element that represents the message type of a message.
MESSAGE_SEQ_NUM - Static variable in class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory
The name of the element that represents the sequence number of the message [it is set by the root peer of the channel]
MSG_BULK - Static variable in class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory
The value that element MESSAGETYPE has, when the message is only carrying data.
MSG_CLOSE_CHANNEL - Static variable in class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory
The value that element MESSAGETYPE has, when the message is a channel closure message.
MSG_JOIN_REQ - Static variable in class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory
The value that element MESSAGETYPE has, when the message is a Channel Join Request message.
MSG_JOIN_RESP - Static variable in class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory
The value that element MESSAGETYPE has, when the message is a Channel Join Respond message.
MSG_NACK - Static variable in class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory
The value that element MESSAGETYPE has, when the message is a NACK
MSG_RETR - Static variable in class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory
The value that element MESSAGETYPE has, when the message is a retransmission message.
MULTICASTPATH - Static variable in class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory
The name of the element that represents the multicast path of the multicast tree that the message has traversed till now.
McastPath - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableEvent
The path of the multicast tree that is traversed till this hop by the message that we received and then generated the event.
Message2Datagram(Message) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
It converts the Message to a DatagramPacket so that it can be sent through the JxtaMulticastSocket.
Message2String(Message) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
This function creates a String representation of the Message using an XML format.
MessageType - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableEvent
It hold the type of the message that we received.
MsgSeqNum - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableEvent
The Sequence Number of the message that we received, as it is numbered by the root-peer of the channel.
MyServerPipe - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The JxtaServerPipe that every root - provider has to keep alive so that it is possible for the future children to attach under them, by creating bidirectional pipe connections.
main(String[]) - Static method in class rmp.TestRMS
 
mcastSocket - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
The private JxtaMulticastSocket that the RMS is listening to for the formation of the multicast tree [listening for join requests - queries].
messageSeq - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
This variable holds the current sequence number of the last message that has been inserted into the channel.
message_buffer - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The buffer where the incoming messages [data] from our parent arrive to and stored until they are reliably transmitted to next hop.

P

parent_BiDi - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The JxtaBiDiPipe that local node uses to send - receive mesages to - from its parent.
peerID - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The PeerID of the node that has either joined or created the channel.
peerName - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The name of the node that has either joined or created the channel.
periodical_req - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
True if we are an island node [failed to get a response for a channel in RESP_TIMEOUT seconds] and we periodically send channel join requests [queries] till we receive a response.
pgrp - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
The PeerGroup of the node that RMS is running on.
pipeAdv - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The PipeAdvertisement that the channel uses to create the JxtaServerPipe.
pipeAdv - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
The advertisement of the private JxtaMulticastSocket that the RMS is listening to for the formation of the multicast tree.
pipeMsgEvent(PipeMsgEvent) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
Called every time a message reception from our parent occurs and we have to place it in the buffer + forward it to our children.
pipeServ - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
The PipeService of the node that has joined or created the channel.
positionOfDesired() - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
Returns the position of the Message with sequence number = desired_seq_num, inside the MessageBuffer.
prepare_channel() - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
It prepares the bidi connections of the node that has joined (or created) to a (the) channel.
prev_seq - Variable in class rmp.TestRMS
 
print_peer_info(PeerGroup) - Method in class rmp.TestRMS
 
processClosureMessage(Message) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
This function is called automatically when the joined (to the channel) node receives a message with type MSG_CLOSE_CHANNEL from its provider (parent).
processDataMessage(Message) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
This function is called automatically when the joined (to the channel) node receives a message with type MSG_BULK from its provider (parent).
processNACKMessage(Message) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
This function is called automatically when the joined (to the channel) node receives a message with type MSG_NACK from an attached child.
processRMSEvent(JxtaReliableEvent) - Method in interface rmp.JxtaReliableEventListener
* This method is invoked by the JxtaReliableMcastChannel for each incoming message which is addressed to this listener.
processRMSEvent(JxtaReliableEvent) - Method in class rmp.TestRMS
 
processRetransmissionMessage(Message) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
This function is called automatically when the joined (to the channel) node receives a message with type MSG_RETR from its provider (parent).
process_message(Message, InetAddress) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
Process_message is called only if both "service_is_up" and "service_is_joined" are true.
provider - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
This is our provider (parent) and it is possible to have one (not null value) if the node is not the Root of the channel.

RESP_TIMEOUT - Static variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
The amount of time that the main thread will wait for responses, before it characterizes the node as an Island.
RMSException - exception rmp.RMSException.
Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description:
The class RMSException is a form of Throwable that indicates conditions that a reasonable application might want to catch.

Constructs an Exception with no specified detail message.

ReliableMessageFactory - class rmp.ReliableMessageFactory.
Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description:
This class has the puprose to provide some ease
-- on the construction of a message,
-- on extracting some message elements and
-- it also provides the constants of the RMS [all messages are RMS specific].

rms_Thread - Variable in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
The indepedent thread of RMS that starts running after start_service() is called.
run() - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
If the node is a provider of the channel, it has to wait for incoming bidi connections from other nodes (the children).
run() - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
This is the method that implements the Runnable interface and should be only called from inside the JxtaReliableMcastService [through start_service() and rms_Thread.start()] and never from outside even though run() is public.

send_multicast_query_for_channel(String) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
This function sends a query message through the private mcastSocket to the listening providers & root.
send_unicast_response_for_channel(String, String, String, InetAddress) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
A provider uses this function to respond after receiving an incoming QueryMessage but it uses the unicast send mode of JxtaMulticastSocket to send the respond only to the one who is interested [the sender of the query].

startJxta() - Method in class rmp.TestRMS
 
start_periodical_requests() - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
It is called when we receive no responses to our QueryMessage in RESP_TIMEOUT and so we are Island.
start_service() - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
It is called from outside (external class) to start running the JxtaReliableMcastService object that we previously have created.
stop_periodical() - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
Is called whenever we have to stop sending periodically QueryMessages, usually after we receive a response from a provider.
stop_service() - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastService
It is called from outside (external class) to stop running the JxtaReliableMcastService object that we previously have created.
store_message(Message, int) - Method in class rmp.JxtaReliableMcastChannel
Places the given message (msg param) with sequence number new_seq_num in the right position inside the buffer for the received messages "message_buffer".
